means: 黄道的，日（或月）食的，蚀的

word_mean: 过天球中心与地球公转的平均轨道面平行的平面与天球相交的大圆。

sentence.Network_en: Its intersection with the celestial sphere will be a great circle -- the ecliptic.
sentence.Network_cn: 它与天球相交处形成一个大圆 -- 黄道.

sentence.Network_en: The obliquity of the ecliptic is the fundamental cause of the seasons.
sentence.Network_cn: 黄道的倾角是季节的基本成因.

sentence.Network_en: The zodiacal glow refers to the diffuse scattered sunlight on the ecliptic plane.
sentence.Network_cn: 黄道光指的是在黄道平面上漫散射的太阳光.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 黄道(Ecliptic):行星的轨道面在天球上的投影。也是太阳在天空中的周年视轨道。
黄道面 (Ecliptic)： 是指地球绕太阳公转的轨道平面。
航海及海运专业英语词汇(E1) ... ecliptic system of coordinates 黄道坐标系 ecliptic 黄道;黄道的 ecliptic 黄道黄道的.
ecliptic 黄道;黄道的ecliptic 黄道黄道的ecnephias 地中海的飑或雷暴

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: via Latin from Greek ekleiptikos, from ekleipein 'fail to appear' (see eclipse)

means.word_mean: 1. the great circle representing the apparent annual path of the sun; the plane of the Earth's orbit around the sun; makes an angle of about 23 degrees with the equator;

sentences.sentence: "all of the planets rotate the sun in approximately the same ecliptic"

auth_sentence.content: Like dolphins on either side of the prow of a ship, the Voyagers flank the ecliptic, cruising the front wave of the solar system.
auth_sentence.res_content: Like dolphins on either side of the prow of a ship, the Voyagers flank the ecliptic, cruising the front wave of the solar system.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Like dolphins on either side of the prow of a ship, the Voyagers flank the ecliptic, cruising the front wave of the solar system.

auth_sentence.content: The equatorial system is best used for measuring the position of stars and other objects that are not around the ecliptic.
auth_sentence.res_content: The equatorial system is best used for measuring the position of stars and other objects that are not around the ecliptic.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The equatorial system is best used for measuring the position of stars and other objects that are not around the ecliptic.

auth_sentence.content: But this relies on the stars planetary ecliptic to be aligned somewhat in our direction.
